justification: Excellent comprehensive answer covering all key aspects of hierarchical multi-agent systems. Strong technical depth with clear architectural components and communication patterns. Well-structured presentation with good examples. Minor room for improvement in implementation specifics.
notes: Particularly strong on system design principles

notes: Strong on protocols, weaker on implementation examples

justification: Adequate comparison of coordination strategies with basic coverage of pros/cons. Structure is clear but analysis could be deeper. Missing some nuanced trade-offs and real-world implementation considerations. Good starting point but needs more depth.
notes: Covers basics well but lacks depth in analysis

justification: Outstanding schema design with comprehensive coverage of multi-tenancy, RLS policies, and security considerations. Excellent technical depth with specific SQL examples. Very well structured and professional presentation. Follows instructions perfectly.

notes: Solid technical content, room for more examples

justification: Strong performance optimization guide with comprehensive indexing strategies and query analysis techniques. Good technical depth with practical SQL examples. Well-organized structure with clear progression from analysis to optimization.
